channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 男人穿什么最性感（和最不性感）？我们对 2000 名男性和女性进行了调查。剧透远离红色。
item.description:
What are the sexiest (and least sexy) things men can wear? We surveyed 2,000 men and women. Spoiler: Stay away from red. https://t.co/De2rP2N611 https://t.co/De2rP2N611

item.description:
Have we ruined sex? Five writers ask whether society has lost its way when it comes to the most intimate of human acts. https://t.co/i1xqggbSCU https://t.co/i1xqggbSCU

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 亿万富翁、科技投资者马克-安德森（Marc Andreessen）和他的妻子劳拉-阿里亚加-安德森（Laura Arrillaga-Andreessen）在马里布花费数年时间积累了超过 2.5 亿美元的财产后，将他们长期居住的阿瑟顿住宅推向市场。
item.description:
Billionaire tech investor Marc Andreessen and his wife, Laura Arrillaga-Andreessen, are putting their longtime Atherton home on the market after spending years and more than $250 million accumulating property in Malibu https://t.co/YdAeOLVkZL https://t.co/YdAeOLVkZL

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: Todd Snyder 发现，男士们需要适合工作的服装，但他们也会偶尔放纵一下。这一理念推动他的品牌走向成功。
item.description:
Todd Snyder saw that men wanted palatable, work-appropriate clothes, but they also indulge on occasion. That thesis has propelled his brand to success. https://t.co/ypUzKoUBup https://t.co/ypUzKoUBup

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 医生说，三明治中的火腿片要三思而后行

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 哦，软糖！上周可可的价格飙升，超过了近 50 年前创下的纪录，巧克力商、大型食品公司和爱好者都为此付出了代价
item.description:
Oh fudge! Prices for cocoa last week surged past a record set nearly 50 years ago, costing chocolatiers, big food companies and aficionados alike https://t.co/Xhd3KfgVin https://t.co/Xhd3KfgVin

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 一个多世纪以来，社会一直认为反社会病症是不可治疗和不可救赎的。经过多年的研究和深入治疗，我可以说反社会者并不 "坏"、"邪恶 "或 "疯狂"。我们的行为是为了填补空虚，帕特里克-加涅写道。
item.description:
For more than a century, society has deemed sociopathy untreatable and unredeemable. After years of study and intensive therapy, I can say that sociopaths aren’t “bad” or “evil” or “crazy.” We act out to fill a void, writes Patric Gagne. https://t.co/4jwP24v03z pic.twitter.com/awJciU95Ut

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: "我太年轻了，不适合变老"。人们不遗余力地减少或阻止白发苍苍的过程。一些研究衰老问题的科学家认为，他们可能有所发现。
item.description:
“I’m too young to be old.” People are going to great lengths to reduce or halt the graying process. Some scientists of aging think they might be onto something. https://t.co/AL1HCuZ1EH https://t.co/AL1HCuZ1EH

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 超级名模吉赛尔-邦辰（Gisele Bündchen）几乎每天都坚持锻炼，并保持简单的饮食习惯。"她说："我的全部目标就是尽我所能活得最长，活得最好。
item.description:
Supermodel Gisele Bündchen exercises almost daily and keeps her diet simple. “My whole goal is to live the longest I can living the best life that I can,” she said. https://t.co/LTtWqHLtwo https://t.co/LTtWqHLtwo

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 英伟达（Nvidia）首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）预计将于下周一在一个体育场馆内发布公司的最新芯片，一位分析师将这次活动称为 "人工智能伍德斯托克音乐节"（AI Woodstock）。
item.description:
Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang is expected to unveil his company’s latest chips on Monday in a sports arena at an event one analyst dubbed the “AI Woodstock” https://t.co/UtaCW8LX1w https://t.co/UtaCW8LX1w

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 疯狂三月的首轮比赛是美国体育日历上最疯狂的时刻。我们在这里用数学方法帮您排定观看 NCAA 锦标赛首轮比赛的先后顺序。
item.description:
The opening round of March Madness is the craziest time on the American sports calendar. We're here to help you prioritize which first-round NCAA tournament games to watch—by using a little math. https://t.co/OF9amjlRP7 https://t.co/OF9amjlRP7

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 欧洲最大航空公司的亿万富翁首席执行官今年有望获得 1 亿多美元的奖金。F 炸弹、出言不逊的笑话和醉醺醺的晚餐都是迈克尔-奥利里的口头禅。
item.description:
The billionaire chief executive of Europe’s biggest airline is on course for a $100 million-plus bonus this year. F-bombs, off-color jokes and drunken dinners are all part of Michael O’Leary's lore. https://t.co/DjdhlReZ5d https://t.co/DjdhlReZ5d

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 加沙地带 100 多万人正在经历类似饥荒的状况。粮食不安全问题专家发现，在这块饱受战争蹂躏的飞地上，有证据表明饥饿现象普遍存在，儿童死亡率急剧上升。
item.description:
More than a million people in the Gaza Strip are experiencing famine-like conditions. Food insecurity experts found evidence of widespread starvation and a sharp increase in child mortality in the war-ravaged enclave. https://t.co/tuwhBnBuQk https://t.co/tuwhBnBuQk

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 美国一直在推动肩扛式导弹和无人机，作为台湾抵御入侵的低成本防御手段。台北必须考虑是否需要更多的坦克和喷气式战斗机。
item.description:
